about_the_game:
Sunny love is a short visual novel where you play as a young photographer who didn’t strike big in the capital. He decides to visit his hometown to get some inspiration and new ideas for a comeback. Lady Luck smiles at him as he meets a certain redhead muse...

How this meeting will change his life? Will this muse allow him to get his dream job or will she become more important than anything else? It’s up to you!

Key Features

  • Great sound coverage from girl voice cover with hot moaning to environmental sounds.
  • Fully uncensored scenes filled with both steamy sex and photo sessions with a gorgeous redhead model.
  • An in-game gallery that allows both replaying unlocked scenes and just watching CGs from them.
  • Name your character to make this story your personal one.
  • Quality of life features like hiding all interface elements with a simple button click.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has Male x Female sexual content intended only for adult auditory.

detailed_description:
Sunny love is a short visual novel where you play as a young photographer who didn’t strike big in the capital. He decides to visit his hometown to get some inspiration and new ideas for a comeback. Lady Luck smiles at him as he meets a certain redhead muse...

How this meeting will change his life? Will this muse allow him to get his dream job or will she become more important than anything else? It’s up to you!

Key Features

  • Great sound coverage from girl voice cover with hot moaning to environmental sounds.
  • Fully uncensored scenes filled with both steamy sex and photo sessions with a gorgeous redhead model.
  • An in-game gallery that allows both replaying unlocked scenes and just watching CGs from them.
  • Name your character to make this story your personal one.
  • Quality of life features like hiding all interface elements with a simple button click.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian 8 or higher (or similar platform)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debian 8 or higher (or similar platform)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
